Grocer Vollodos:
Please collect the research ingredients from the monsters in the area. We need Putrefied Extract from the Corpse Devourer, Corpse Absorber, Corpse Shredder, Plagueworm, Contaminated Rottenroot, and Decayed Spore... And Rotten Blood from Swamp Tracker, Swamp Assassin, Swamp Watcher, Corpse Collector, Delegate of Blood, and Blood Aide. We need about 20 of each item to continue to the research.
Please bring me the ingredients. If you do, I will certainly reward you for your trouble. Then, please be careful...
